trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> (or other server or user) controls.
trans-unit.target: Serve como a classe base para todos os controlos que atuam como contentores para de zona <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> (ou outro servidor ou o utilizador) controlos.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control, rendered as an HTML table, that contains other controls in a defined region of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de controlo de peças Web, uma zona é um controlo composto, composto como uma tabela HTML que contém outros controlos numa região definida de uma página Web.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class is a zone that inherits from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, server controls, and user controls.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartZoneBase é uma zona que herda a partir da base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>classe e fornece um conjunto básico de comportamentos para zonas derivadas que contêm <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos, controlos de servidor e controlos de utilizador.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The combination of WebPartZoneBase zones with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server) controls forms the primary UI of a Web Parts application, the normal view of a page that users interact with most of the time.
trans-unit.target: A combinação de WebPartZoneBase zonas com <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(e outro servidor) controlos de forma a IU do principal de uma aplicação de peças Web, a vista normal de uma página que os utilizadores interagem com a maioria do tempo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: All zones provide a common set of UI elements for the controls they contain.
trans-unit.target: Todas as zonas fornecem um conjunto comum de elementos de IU para os controlos contêm.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the UI elements common to all zones, see the class overview topic for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class.
trans-unit.target: Para ver um debate detalhado dos elementos de IU comuns a todas as zonas, consulte o tópico de descrição geral de classe para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase zone includes a body section that contains server controls, and an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object used for rendering the contained controls and their chrome elements, such as their verbs, borders, and so on.
trans-unit.target: A zona WebPartZoneBase inclui uma secção de corpo que contém os controlos de servidor e um associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objecto utilizado para compor os controlos contidos e os elementos do chrome, tais como os verbos, os limites e assim sucessivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the features inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, the WebPartZoneBase class adds client-side control dragging, specific verbs (to enable common UI actions such as minimizing, closing, deleting, and editing controls), and additional style features.
trans-unit.target: Para além das funcionalidades herdadas de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>classe, a classe de WebPartZoneBase adiciona o arrastamento de controlo do lado do cliente, verbos específicos (para ativar ações comuns do tipo IU como minimizando, fechar, eliminar e editar controlos) e funcionalidades adicionais de estilo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class is also the class to inherit from if you want to design a custom zone that is database-driven.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartZoneBase também é a classe a herdar se pretender criar uma zona personalizada que é suscitada pelo departamento de base de dados.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create a custom weather Web Parts zone that inherits from WebPartZoneBase, and is designed to contain and provide layout features and other services for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that are data-bound and display weather information.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode criar uma zona de peças Web que herda de WebPartZoneBase, não sendo concebido para conter e fornecer funcionalidades de esquema e outros serviços de Meteorologia personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos vinculados a dados e apresentam informações de Meteorologia.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class contains a number of properties for working with style attributes in a zone.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartZoneBase contém um número de propriedades para trabalhar com atributos de estilo numa zona.

trans-unit.source: There are several properties for borders, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Existem várias propriedades dos limites, incluindo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a group of properties for working with style attributes of menus that can appear in the header of a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A>, and others.
trans-unit.target: Há um grupo de propriedades para trabalhar com atributos de estilo de menus, que podem ser apresentado no cabeçalho de uma zona, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A>entre outros.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class also contains a number of members for handling verbs in a zone.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartZoneBase também contém um número de membros para processamento de verbos numa zona.

trans-unit.source: These members relate to the verbs that appear on the part controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Estes membros relacionados com os verbos que aparecem nos controlos parte na zona.

trans-unit.source: While zone-level verbs can be added to WebPartZoneBase zones, by default they do not have any.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto podem ser adicionados verbos de nível de zona para zonas WebPartZoneBase, por predefinição não têm qualquer.

trans-unit.source: There is a set of standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set for use with part controls, and developers can add custom verbs as well.
trans-unit.target: Existe um conjunto de verbos padrão fornecida com o controlo de peças Web definidos para utilização com controlos de peça, e os programadores podem adicionar bem verbos personalizados.

trans-unit.source: Some important properties for working with verbs include properties that reference some of the standard verb objects, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Algumas propriedades importantes para trabalhar com verbos incluem propriedades que fazem referência alguns objetos verbo padrão, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The standard verbs appear on a verbs menu (typically presented in the UI as a drop-down menu) in the title bar of each control contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Os verbos padrão são apresentadas no menu de verbos (normalmente, é apresentado na IU como um menu pendente) na barra de título da cada controlo contido numa zona.

trans-unit.source: There is also a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property that allows you to determine what type of clickable object represents a verb in the UI.
trans-unit.target: Há também um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>propriedade permite-lhe determinar o tipo de objeto clicável representa um verbo na IU.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other key members for working with verbs include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event.
trans-unit.target: Outros membros de chaves para trabalhar com verbos incluem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>método, o que é um processador de eventos que pode ser substituído para processamento de personalizado o verbo do processo de criação, e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class contains a number of members for working with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained within a zone.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartZoneBase contém um número de membros para trabalhar com <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos incluídos dentro de uma zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property references the collection of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server) controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>propriedade referencia a coleção de todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(e outro servidor) controlos na zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Several methods correspond to the standard verbs or actions that a user can carry out on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Vários métodos correspondem ao verbos padrão ou ações que um utilizador pode realizar no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controla numa zona, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: There are also a number of members in the WebPartZoneBase class that concern how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are laid out or arranged within the zone.
trans-unit.target: Também existem esse preocupação de classe de um número de membros no WebPartZoneBase como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos são dispostos ou dispostos na zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property determines whether controls can be moved among zones or rearranged within a zone by users.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>propriedade determina se os controlos podem ser movidos entre zonas ou reorganizar dentro de uma zona pelos utilizadores.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property allows you to determine whether the controls in a zone are arranged horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>propriedade permite-lhe determinar se os controlos numa zona são dispostos horizontal ou verticalmente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer might render the height of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer poderá impossibilitar a altura de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>ou o respetivos contidos controlos de uma forma inesperado, consoante a orientação da zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes, consulte a documentação para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other methods in the WebPartZoneBase class provide you with detailed programmatic control over the rendering of the various areas of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Outros métodos na classe WebPartZoneBase fornecem-lhe controlo programático detalhado sobre a composição de várias áreas de uma zona.

trans-unit.source: Many of these methods override the base methods inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, to customize the rendering for zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Muitos destes métodos substituem os métodos base herdados de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>classe, personalizar a composição para zonas que contêm <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: Important methods include <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Importante métodos incluem <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a classe para utilização por uma instância de classe herdada.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor só pode ser chamado por uma classe herdada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the layout of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls can be changed within a zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o esquema de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos podem ser alterados dentro de uma zona.

trans-unit.source: The AllowLayoutChange property takes effect only when a zone is in a page display mode in which the layout of controls in the zone can be changed, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AllowLayoutChange entra em vigor apenas quando uma zona está no modo de visualização de página na qual pode ser alterado o esquema dos controlos na zona, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When AllowLayoutChange is set to `false` on a given zone, there are a number of actions that end users are prevented from carrying out on controls in the zone: - Users cannot drag controls to a different zone, rearrange controls within the zone, or move controls into the zone.
trans-unit.target: Quando AllowLayoutChange está definida como `false` numa determinada zona, existem várias ações que os utilizadores finais impedidos de ser executado em controlos na zona:-os utilizadores não é possível arraste os controlos para uma zona diferente, reorganizar controlos na zona ou mover controlos para a zona.

trans-unit.source: - A number of properties that affect the user interface (UI) of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are disabled so that users cannot edit those properties while the control is being edited using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> controls..
trans-unit.target: -Um número de propriedades que afetam a interface de utilizador (UI) de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos na zona estão desativados para que os utilizadores não é possível editar essas propriedades enquanto o controlo está a ser editado utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlos..</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: - Users cannot add new controls to the zone from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: -Os utilizadores não é possível adicionar novos controlos para a zona de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: - The close, delete, minimize, and restore verbs are not shown on controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: -O fechar, eliminar, minimizar e restaurar verbos não são mostrados em controlos na zona.

trans-unit.source: Although the AllowLayoutChange property affects end users' ability to change the layout of a zone through the UI, it does not affect the ability to change the layout programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Embora a propriedade AllowLayoutChange afeta a capacidade dos próprios utilizadores finais para alterar o esquema de uma zona através da IU, não afeta a capacidade de alterar o esquema através de programação.

trans-unit.source: For example, if AllowLayoutChange is set to `false`, users cannot close controls in the zone, but a developer could still call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A> method to close controls programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se AllowLayoutChange estiver definido como `false`, os utilizadores não é possível fechar controlos na zona, mas um programador ainda foi possível chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>método Fechar controla programaticamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não pode ser definida por temas ou temas de folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [temas ASP.NET e das máscaras de](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the layout can be changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o esquema pode ser alterado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color for the border of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor do limite de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> property is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to set a default color for zone borders.
trans-unit.target: A base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>propriedade seja substituída pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe para definir uma cor predefinida dos limites da zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderColor property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir a propriedade de BorderColor para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controlar de forma declarativa ou através de programação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: O limite é apresentada apenas quando a zona está no modo de apresentar página na qual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>as funcionalidades de interface (IU) do utilizador classe estão visíveis, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that contains the border color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que contém a cor do limite.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray*>.
trans-unit.target: A cor predefinida é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of border that surrounds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de limite que rodeia um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to set the default border style for zones.
trans-unit.target: A base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>propriedade seja substituída pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe para definir o estilo de limite predefinido para zonas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderStyle property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir a propriedade BorderStyle é para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controlar de forma declarativa ou através de programação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: O limite é apresentada apenas quando a zona está no modo de apresentar página na qual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>as funcionalidades de interface (IU) do utilizador classe estão visíveis, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref> object that contains the kind of border.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"> </xref> objeto que contém o tipo de limite.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the border that surrounds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura do limite que rodeia um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> property is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to set the default border width for zones.
trans-unit.target: A base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>propriedade seja substituída pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe para definir a largura do limite predefinido para zonas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderWidth property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir a propriedade BorderWidth um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controlar de forma declarativa ou através de programação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: O limite é apresentada apenas quando a zona está no modo de apresentar página na qual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>as funcionalidades de interface (IU) do utilizador classe estão visíveis, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The width in the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> of the border that surrounds a zone.
trans-unit.target: A largura em especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> do limite que rodeia uma zona.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to close the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objeto que permite aos utilizadores finais fechar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos numa zona.

trans-unit.source: The close verb referenced by the CloseVerb property appears in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: O verbo fechar referenciado pela propriedade CloseVerb aparece no menu de verbos de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo numa zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Closing a control removes it from interaction on a page, although if developers provide the appropriate user interface (UI), such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone that contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, a user can switch the page into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> and add a previously closed instance of a control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: Fechar um controlo remove-o da interação numa página, embora se os programadores fornecer a interface de utilizador adequada (IU), tal como um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>zona que contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>controlo, um utilizador pode mudar a página no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>e adicionar uma instância anteriormente fechada de um controlo regressar à página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to close <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> que permite aos utilizadores finais fechar <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: Closes a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Fecha uma selecionado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo numa zona.

trans-unit.source: The typical way for an end user to close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is by clicking the close verb in the control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: A forma típica para um utilizador final fechar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo é clicando o verbo Fechar na barra de título. do controlo</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The CloseWebPart method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which carries out the action of closing the control.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método CloseWebPart o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>método no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe que acarreta enviados a ação de fechar o controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: O método só deve ser utilizado por derivada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zonas como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is not rendered on a page.
trans-unit.target: Um fechado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo não é composto numa página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is added to the page catalog, which maintains a list of all closed controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, é adicionada ao catálogo de página, o que mantém uma lista de todos os controlos fechados numa página.

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts page on which a user closes a control also has an `<asp:PageCatalogPart>` element declared with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, then the user can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the closed control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: Se uma página de peças Web em que um utilizador fecha um controlo tem também uma `<asp:PageCatalogPart>` elemento declarado com um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, em seguida, o utilizador pode mudar a página no modo de apresentação do catálogo e adicione o controlo fechado regressar à página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a user to be able to close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property on the control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property on the zone must both be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para um utilizador conseguir fechar uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>propriedade no controlo e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>propriedade no horário têm de ser definida `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be closed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo a ser fechado.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to create connections between <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objeto que permite aos utilizadores finais criar ligações entre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that creates a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> que cria uma ligação entre dois <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the process of creating a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processo de criação de uma ligação entre dois <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: The ConnectWebPart method can be called only when the page is in connect display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>).
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar o método de ConnectWebPart apenas quando a página é ligar no modo de apresentação (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The method in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A> method, which completes the several steps necessary to fully connect two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Por sua vez chama o método de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>método, que conclui a vários passos necessários para totalmente ligar dois <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: O método só deve ser utilizado por derivada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zonas como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that initiates the connection with another selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo que inicia a ligação com outro selecionado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of child controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Cria o conjunto de subordinados controlos incluídos numa zona.

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create the set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateChildControls substitui a base de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para criar o conjunto de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos incluídos numa zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the Web Parts page is in design mode, because the layout of the controls on the page (and within zones) can be changed in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Isto ocorre quando a página de peças Web está no modo de estrutura, porque o esquema dos controlos na página (e dentro de zonas) pode ser alterado no modo de estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls within a zone must likewise be created to accommodate possible changes in the order or occurrence of controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos dentro de uma zona da mesma forma tem de ser criados para acomodar possíveis alterações na ordem ou da ocorrência de controlos na zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object that contains all the controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém todos os controlos numa zona.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains references to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> que contém referências ao <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos numa zona.

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of style characteristics that apply to a zone control when it is visible.
trans-unit.target: Cria um conjunto das características de estilo que se aplicam a um controlo de zona quando está visível.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method creates a set of standard style attributes that apply to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateControlStyle cria um conjunto de atributos de estilo de padrão que se aplicam ao <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zonas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The style attributes apply only when a page is in a display mode in which a zone itself is visible, such as catalog, edit, or design display mode.
trans-unit.target: Os atributos de estilo aplicam-se apenas quando uma página está no modo de apresentação em que uma zona é visível, tais como o catálogo, editar ou modo de apresentação da estrutura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> que contém os atributos de estilo de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the verbs are created for a zone that derives from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os verbos são criados para uma zona que deriva de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a handler to this event, and attach additional custom verbs to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> child zone.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores de página podem adicionar um processador para este evento e anexar verbos personalizados adicionais para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona subordinada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The CreateVerbs event is raised when the verbs are created for a zone, which happens either during the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> stage of page processing, or during postback events.
trans-unit.target: O evento de CreateVerbs é gerado quando são criados os verbos para uma zona, que ocorre o durante o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>fase do processamento de página ou durante originem eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Enables derived zones to substitute a custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object to change the appearance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Permite derivada zonas para substituir um personalizado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> o objeto a alterar o aspecto do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos numa zona.

trans-unit.source: Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Refere-se do chrome de peças Web para os elementos de interface (IU) do utilizador periféricos moldura cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo numa zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The chrome for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar.
trans-unit.target: O chrome para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo inclui respetivo limite, a barra de título e ícones, texto do título e menu de verbos que aparecem dentro da barra de título.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: O aspecto do Cromado é definido ao nível da zona e aplica-se a todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos numa zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object affects the entire rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, not merely their chrome elements.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objeto afeta a composição de toda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controla, não apenas os elementos do chrome.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: To use the CreateWebPartChrome method, you must create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object to define the appearance of the chrome for Web Parts controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar o método CreateWebPartChrome, tem de criar um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objeto para definir a aparência de cromado das peças Web controlos numa zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: You must also create a custom zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class and overrides the CreateWebPartChrome method to be able to substitute your custom chrome object and apply it to the controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Também tem de criar uma zona personalizada que herda a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe e substitui o método CreateWebPartChrome para conseguir a substituir o objeto do chrome personalizado e aplicá-la aos controlos na zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> that determines how <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone are rendered.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> que determina como <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos numa zona são apresentados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to delete the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objeto que permite aos utilizadores finais eliminar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos numa zona.

trans-unit.source: The delete verb referenced by the DeleteVerb property appears in the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: O verbo de eliminação referenciado pela propriedade DeleteVerb aparece no menu pendente verbos na barra de título da cada dinâmico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo numa zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The delete verb is not available on static controls (controls declared in the markup of the Web page).
trans-unit.target: O verbo de eliminação não está disponível em controlos estáticos (controlos declarados na marcação de página Web).

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in a display mode that enables you to change the page layout, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: O verbo aparece no menu de verbos apenas quando a página está no modo de apresentação que lhe permite alterar o esquema de página, tal como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: Deleting a control permanently removes the instance of that control from a page.
trans-unit.target: Eliminar permanentemente um controlo remove a instância desse controlo uma página.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a closed control, a deleted instance of a control can never be added back to a page.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de um controlo fechado, uma instância de um controlo eliminada nunca pode ser adicionada novamente para uma página.

trans-unit.source: When a user deletes a control, and then switches a page into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, the deleted control instance is not available in it.
trans-unit.target: Quando um utilizador elimina um controlo e, em seguida, muda uma página para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, se a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>zona contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>controlo, a instância do controlo eliminado não está disponível no mesmo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The user can add a new instance of a control, if the control is available in the catalog, but the deleted instance has been permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode adicionar uma nova instância de um controlo se o controlo está disponível no catálogo, mas foi removida a instância foi eliminada permanentemente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to delete <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> que permite aos utilizadores finais eliminar <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Elimina um selecionado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo numa zona.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and if `webPart` is static, an exception is thrown because static controls (controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page) cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método e se `webPart` é estático, é emitida uma exceção porque controlos estáticos (de controlos que são declarados no markup de uma página Web) não podem ser eliminados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: O método só deve ser utilizado por derivada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zonas como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo a ser eliminada.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the text being used as the title for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone when the zone itself is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor atual do texto a ser utilizado como o título de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona quando a zona está visível.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayTitle property either gets its value from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A> property or, if that value is `null`, uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value for the zone.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DisplayTitle ou obtém o valor da base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>propriedade ou, se esse valor for `null`, utiliza o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>valor para a zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the title text for a zone.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o texto do título de uma zona.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*> property.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o valor da base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls can be dragged into or out of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos podem ser arrastados ou a sair de uma zona.

trans-unit.source: The DragDropEnabled property indicates whether <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be dragged into or out of a zone at run time.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DragDropEnabled indica se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos podem ser arrastados ou a sair de uma zona em tempo de execução.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The property is used specifically for checking whether the page is in a page display mode that allows drag-and-drop editing, and whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade é utilizada especificamente para verificar se a página está no modo de visualização de página que permite a edição de arrastar e largar e se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether controls can be dragged.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se os controlos podem ser arrastados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color around the border of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone and its drop-cue regions when a user is dragging a control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor à volta de limite de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona e a respetivas regiões de largar rectângulos quando um utilizador é arrastar um controlo.

trans-unit.source: When a dragged control is held over a zone where it can be dropped, drop-cue regions appear, showing the area in which the control can be dropped, and it is for these regions, as well as the zone itself, that the DragHighlightColor property affects the border color.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controlo dragged é mantido através de uma zona onde poder ser removida, regiões de largar rectângulos são apresentadas, que mostra a área na qual o controlo pode ser removido e é para estas regiões, bem como a zona, que a propriedade DragHighlightColor afeta a cor do limite.

trans-unit.source: The DragHighlightColor property enables you to set the color that appears to a user when they drag a control in the zone.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DragHighlightColor permite-lhe definir a cor que é apresentado como um utilizador quando estes arraste um controlo na zona.

trans-unit.source: The DragHighlightColor property takes effect only when a Web page is in a display mode that enables the layout of a zone to be changed, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DragHighlightColor entra em vigor apenas quando uma página Web no modo de apresentação que permite que o esquema de uma zona ser alteradas, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that contains the highlight color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que contém as cores de realce.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>.
trans-unit.target: A cor predefinida é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objeto que permite aos utilizadores finais editar <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos numa zona.

trans-unit.source: The edit verb referenced by the EditVerb property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control enables an end user to switch a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the zone into edit mode, where the user can personalize the appearance, properties, layout, and content of the control.
trans-unit.target: O verbo de edição referenciado pela propriedade EditVerb num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controlo permite que um utilizador final mudar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo na zona para o modo de edição, onde o utilizador pode personalizar o aspeto, propriedades, esquema e conteúdo do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The same edit verb is used for all controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: O verbo editar mesmo é utilizado para todos os controlos numa zona.

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts page enters into the edit display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>), the edit verb becomes visible in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma página de peças Web entra no modo de apresentação Editar (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>), o verbo editar fica visível no menu de verbos de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo contido na zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> que permite aos utilizadores finais editar <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the process of editing a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processo de edição selecionada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo numa zona.

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: O método só deve ser utilizado por derivada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zonas como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be edited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo a ser editado.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a message that appears when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control contains no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma mensagem que é apresentado quando um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> controlo contém não <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: The EmptyZoneText property overrides the base property to distinguish between cases where the property has not been set and those where it has been set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EmptyZoneText substitui a propriedade de base para distinguir entre casos em que a propriedade não foi definida e em que foi definido como uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: If the property has not been set and the zone contains no controls, when a Web Parts page enters into a display mode where the zone is visible, a default culture-specific text message appears in an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade não foi definida e a zona contém sem controlos, quando uma página de peças Web entra no modo de apresentação em que a zona está visível, é apresentada uma mensagem de texto específicas do idioma de predefinição na vazio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: If the EmptyZoneText property value has intentionally been set to an empty string, then no text message appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da propriedade EmptyZoneText intencionalmente tiver sido definido como uma cadeia vazia, em seguida, nenhuma mensagem de texto é apresentada uma zona em branco.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém a mensagem que aparece numa zona em branco.

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de idioma específico predefinido é fornecida pelo .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to export an XML definition file for each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objeto que permite aos utilizadores finais exportar um ficheiro de definição de XML para cada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo numa zona.

trans-unit.source: The export verb referenced by the ExportVerb property appears in the verbs drop-down menu within the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: O verbo de exportação referenciado pela propriedade ExportVerb aparece no menu pendente verbos da barra de títulos de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo numa zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the verbs menu in all page display modes.
trans-unit.target: O verbo é apresentada no menu de verbos em todos os modos de visualização de página.

trans-unit.source: To enable users to export a definition file for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property on a control to something other than its default value, which is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir aos utilizadores exportar um ficheiro de definição para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo, também tem de definir a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>propriedade de um controlo para algo que não seja o valor predefinido, que é <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to export a definition file for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> que permite que os utilizadores finais exportar um ficheiro de definição para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: Returns the actual or effective current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> value of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, given the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*> property of the zone and the current display mode of the Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o atual eficiente ou real <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> valor de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo, dado o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*>propriedade de zona e o atual modo de visualização da página de peças Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref> control for which the zone needs to retrieve the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*> setting.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"> </xref> controlo para o qual a zona tem de obter atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*>definição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> value that contains the kind of border that currently frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> valor que contém o tipo de limite que, atualmente enquadra controlos de peças Web contidos por uma zona.

trans-unit.source: Gets an initial collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls contained in a zone, based on a template or some storage medium.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção inicial de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos incluídos numa zona, com base em algumas meio de armazenamento ou de um modelo.

trans-unit.source: The GetInitialWebParts method gets the initial collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls for a zone only if there is a preexisting template or other form of storage that determines what controls are in the zone.
trans-unit.target: O método GetInitialWebParts obtém a coleção inicial de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controla para uma zona apenas se existir um modelo pré-existentes ou de outra forma de armazenamento que determina quais os controlos são na zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The method does not reflect any personalization changes, which might mean that controls in the initial collection have actually been moved by a user into another zone.
trans-unit.target: O método não reflete as alterações de personalização, que podem significar que controlos na coleção inicial, na verdade, foram movidos por um utilizador para outra zona.

trans-unit.source: The initial collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are not necessarily the same as the collection contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property of the zone, which reflects the actual current collection of controls in the zone when a page is rendered, taking into account any personalization changes that have been made.
trans-unit.target: A coleção inicial de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos na zona não são necessariamente a mesma que a coleção contida no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>propriedade de zona, o que reflete a coleção atual real dos controlos na zona quando uma página é composta, tendo em conta quaisquer alterações de personalização que tiverem sido efetuadas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"></xref> that contains the initial set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls that belong in a zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"> </xref> que contém o conjunto inicial de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos que pertencem uma zona.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a footer area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se uma zona tem uma área de rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The HasFooter property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set the default value to `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade HasFooter substitui a base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para definir o valor predefinido para `false` para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone has a footer area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a zona tem uma área de rodapé; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a header area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se uma zona tem uma área de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The HasHeader property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set the default value to `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls when the page display mode is in normal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade HasHeader substitui a base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para definir o valor predefinido para `false` para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controlos quando o modo de apresentar a página está a ser normal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts page is in one of the display modes that allow page design, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, then the value of the HasHeader property is `true`, so that the specified zone can display header user interface (UI) elements.
trans-unit.target: Se uma página de peças Web está a ser um dos modos de apresentação que permitem a estrutura de página, tal como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, em seguida, o valor da propriedade HasHeader é `true`, para que a zona especificada pode apresentar os elementos de interface (IU) do utilizador de cabeçalho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone has a header area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a zona tem uma área de cabeçalho; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when the page is in normal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> quando a página está a ser normal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object used to access Help content for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objecto utilizado para aceder ao conteúdo de ajuda para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlos numa zona.

trans-unit.source: The HelpVerb property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade HelpVerb pode ser acedida de forma declarativa ou através de programação.

trans-unit.source: You can access it declaratively within a zone by using the `<asp:HelpVerb>` element to set the text, the description, whether the verb is enabled, and other attributes.
trans-unit.target: Consegue aceder-lhe forma declarativa dentro de uma zona utilizando o `<asp:HelpVerb>` elemento para definir o texto, a descrição, se o verbo está ativado e outros atributos.

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to declare a help verb for a zone, however, because it is enabled by default.
